about.title: About us
about.1: BookingCare is an appointment booking platform that makes it easy for patients to choose the right doctor from a network of good specialists, with verified information and quick booking.
about.2: 1. BookingCare's team works directly with doctors to verify accurate, clear, up-to-date information about specialties, training - training, and work experience.
about.3: 2. Provide guidance content to help patients easily choose the right doctor for their problem for a highly effective examination.
about.4: 3. The system suggests a list of suitable doctors for patients to choose based on signs, symptoms or reasons for going to the doctor.
about.5: 4. The system will update the feedback of patients who have visited with each doctor so that the patient can have more reference information and choose the right doctor.
about.6: We are researching, applying artificial intelligence / big data (AI / Big Data) step by step to connect patients to the right doctor for their condition.

Data.title: Health facilities
Data.p1: BookingCare is the leading comprehensive healthcare platform in Vietnam that connects users with more than 200 prestigious hospitals - clinics, more than 1,500 good specialists and thousands of medical services and products. High Quality.

Detail.guide1: BookingCare is Vietnam's leading comprehensive healthcare platform that connects users with more than 200 prestigious hospitals - clinics, more than 1,500 good specialists and thousands of quality medical products and services. High.
Detail.guide2: From now on, patients can make an appointment at the Clinic on demand,
Detail.li1: Selected professors, doctors, specialists with experience
Detail.li2: Support to book online before going to the doctor (free of charge)
Detail.li3: Reduce waiting time during check-in procedures and prioritize first check-ups

Data.title: Why would a BookingCare Doctor solve your problem?
Data.card1_p: Network of good specialists who have/are working at leading major institutes, with verified information.
Data.card2_p: Full of specialties, detailed doctor information, easy-to-understand instructions, patients easily choose the right doctor.
Data.card3_p: We effectively support patients during the pre-exam, during and after the visit.
Data.card4_p: The doctor's appointment schedule is displayed 24/7 to help you proactively choose the right appointment schedule.
Data.card5_p: Booking through BookingCare is free. Medical examination and treatment costs, you pay directly at the examination place.
Data.card6_p: If the patient is not satisfied with the examination, consultation and treatment plan of the doctor.
